059C64AB.Callback5Header: (Nightmare) Complete the Fallen Temple Capstone Dungeon

68161728.Phase3Description:
Complete the Fallen Temple Capstone Dungeon in World Tier 3: Nightmare to unlock World Tier 4: Torment.

In Torment, monsters give 200% increased Experience.

Ancestral items and new Unique items become available in Torment.

D53BFF05.Phase0Description:
Visit the World Tier Statue in Kyovashad to unlock World Tier 4: Torment.

In Torment, monsters give 200% increased Experience.

Ancestral items and new Unique items become available in Torment.
